text: Pasquale Squitieri (27 November 1938 - 18 February 2017) was an Italian movie director and screenwriter. He was best known for his Spaghetti Western movies. He was also known as William Redfield. He was born in Naples. Squitieri died on 18 February 2017 in Rome, at the age of 78. ==Filmography== *Io e Dio (1969) *Vengeance Is a Dish Served Cold (1971) *Camorra (1972) *I guappi (1974) *The Climber (1975) *Il prefetto di ferro (1977) *Corleone (1978) *L'arma (1978) *Savage Breed (1980) *Claretta (1984) *The Repenter (1985) *Naso di cane (1986) (TV miniseries) *The Third Solution (1988) *Gli invisibili (1988) *Atto di dolore (1990) *Il colore dell'odio (1990) *Li chiamarono... briganti! (1999) *L'avvocato de Gregorio (2003) *Father (2011) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Italian movie directors Category:Movie people from Naples
title: Pasquale Squitieri
